# uv2json

`uv2json` is a python script that converts Gilson GX-270 exported CSVs to JSON format

## Installation

```bash
pip install uv2json
```

## Usage

```bash
$ uv2json <path/to/csv/files>
```

The script will make a JSON file in the same location with the same name.
